department.dept_long_name: Committee on Degrees in Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality
department.dept_short_name: Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality

course.course_group: Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality
course.title: A Voice of One's Own: Creative Writing in Women, Gender, and Sexuality
course.description: Students write and analyze short stories, paying close attention to key writing concepts such as characterization, voice, point-of-view, dialogue, and setting, while also investigating thematic issues related to women, gender, and sexuality studies. Frequent writing assignments, including written evaluations of peers' stories.
